services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional solutions tailored to your needs

legal.title: Legal Assistance
legal.description: In your business relationships, you can request a preliminary audit of your contractual documents or any other document that may have legal implications.
legal.longDescription: Our firm provides comprehensive legal expertise to secure all your commercial and contractual operations. We work upstream of your commitments to identify legal risks and propose solutions tailored to your activity. Our preventive approach helps you avoid costly disputes and preserve your business relationships.
features: Advice on documents with legal implications

details.intro: Our legal assistance service supports you in all your legal and contractual procedures.

section1.title: Contractual Audit
section1.content: We thoroughly analyze your commercial contracts, partnerships, distribution agreements, and any other document engaging your liability. Our expertise allows you to identify unfavorable clauses, legal risks, and optimization opportunities.

section2.title: Legal Advice
section2.content: Our lawyers advise you on all legal aspects of your activity: corporate law, commercial law, intellectual property, and regulatory compliance. We help you make informed decisions with full knowledge of legal implications.

section3.title: Drafting and Negotiation
section3.content: We draft and negotiate your contracts to best protect your interests. Our legal documents are adapted to your sector of activity and comply with current regulations.

fiscal.title: Tax Assistance
fiscal.description: We provide our tax expertise for monthly control of your tax declarations and advice on optimizing your tax burden.
fiscal.longDescription: Taxation is a major strategic issue for any company. Our team of tax experts supports you to optimize your tax burden while strictly complying with current regulations. We ensure regular monitoring of your declarative obligations and advise you on the best tax optimization strategies adapted to your situation.

details.intro: Benefit from expert tax support to optimize your taxation and ensure your compliance.

section1.title: Declaration Control
section1.content: We perform monthly verification of all your tax declarations to ensure their accuracy and compliance with current legislation. This systematic approach minimizes the risk of errors and potential penalties.

section2.title: Tax Optimization
section2.content: Our tax experts analyze your situation to identify all legal optimization opportunities. We advise you on the most advantageous tax regimes and help you structure your operations to minimize your tax burden while respecting legal frameworks.

section3.title: Tax Audit Support
section3.content: In case of tax audit, we support you throughout the procedure. We prepare necessary documents, represent you before tax authorities, and defend your interests to obtain the best possible outcome.

social.title: Social Assistance
social.description: Administrative management, employment contracts, and complete HR support.
social.longDescription: Social management is complex and constantly evolving. Our social and HR experts support you in managing all your obligations towards employees and social protection organizations. We help you secure your employment relationships and optimize your HR practices.

details.intro: Our social assistance service provides expert support for all your HR and social obligations.

section1.title: Administrative Management
section1.content: We handle all administrative formalities related to your staff: hiring declarations, social security registrations, employment contract updates, exit procedures. We ensure your compliance with social legislation and deadlines to respect.

section2.title: Employment Contracts
section2.content: We draft and review your employment contracts to ensure they comply with labor legislation and protect your interests. We advise you on specific clauses and applicable collective agreements in your sector.

section3.title: HR Advice
section3.content: Beyond administrative management, we support you in implementing HR best practices: performance evaluation, skills development, conflict management, and internal communication. Our goal is to help you create a productive and fulfilling work environment.

recruitment.title: Recruitment Assistance
recruitment.description: Because we understand that finding a profile adapted to your needs can be tedious, we offer to outsource this recruitment process.
recruitment.longDescription: Recruitment is a crucial issue for your company's success. Finding the right candidate requires time, expertise, and resources. Our recruitment assistance service allows you to delegate this strategic mission to experienced professionals who master sourcing and candidate evaluation techniques.

details.intro: Entrust us with your recruitment to access the best market talents.

section1.title: Sourcing and Headhunting
section1.content: We use our extensive network and advanced sourcing techniques to identify the best profiles matching your needs. Our targeted approach gives you access to qualified talents, even for hard-to-fill positions.

section2.title: Evaluation and Selection
section2.content: We perform rigorous pre-selection of candidates through in-depth interviews, skills tests, and reference checks. You only meet the most relevant candidates for your position.

section3.title: Integration Support
section3.content: Our support doesn't stop at recruitment. We help you implement an effective onboarding process to facilitate your new hires' integration and ensure their success in your company.

training.title: Training
training.description: We have developed proven expertise in inter and intra-company training with established know-how in skills development support.
training.longDescription: Developing your employees' skills is a strategic investment for your company's performance and competitiveness. Our training offer adapts to your specific needs and your sector's realities. We offer tailor-made programs led by recognized experts in their field.

details.intro: Develop your teams' skills with our adapted training programs.

section1.title: Inter-Company Training
section1.content: Our inter-company sessions allow your employees to develop their skills while exchanging with professionals from other structures. This approach promotes experience sharing and mutual enrichment.

section2.title: Intra-Company Training
section2.content: We design tailor-made training adapted to your context and specific issues. Our intra-company programs are delivered at your premises and personalized according to your needs and company culture.

section3.title: Development Support
section3.content: Beyond training, we support you in implementing a true skills development strategy. We help you identify training needs, design development paths, and measure the impact of your training investments.
